name: Air Ball: Infinity
description:
Air Ball: Infinity is the newest game made by me,

 it's an funny endless runner game with good graphics and three different biomes, a cool looking world and many great but difficult Jump'n Run stages. Doge the many obstacles and survive!

The world generation is generated
randomly with good graphics
and has beautiful details, 
as floating clouds, good lightning,
birds and great trees! 

The game has two different hard modes for
real fun! The principle of the first one is
simple and makes you addicted: 
You have a bouncing ball in the world and need 
to get it into a goal. The goal is hard to reach
on the other end of the level. Your rank
gets higher if you pass a level, but
the level will get more difficult!

The second fun mode in the game
is based on infinity world generation.
Keep alive as long as possible with your
bouncing ball.
Doge the many obstacles and survive
in this limitless, tricky world and
get the new best highscore!

Collect coins in three different biomes in
the game. You can buy epic skins for yourself,
like a rainbow ball with the coins! Grind for new
skins!

Challenge your friends with google
highscores in this epic infinity run game! 
Be the best! 

Planned:
- play against bosses!
- more types of coins!
- upgrading your character!
- other biomes!
- more skins for grind!

Current features:
- The game has an endless world!
- play in different biomes!
- 2 play modes!
- cool Jump and Run!
- Beautiful lightning!
- funny skins.
- get stronger and better!
- best tricky casual game for inbetween!
- Highscores to mess against friends!
- grinding mechanics!
- different skins to customize your ball!
- pretty lowpoly graphics!
